Aura: Protective Ward.name: Aura: Protective Ward
Aura: Protective Ward.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.lY9fOk1qBDDhBT8s]{Protective Ward}.

You emanate a shimmering aura of protective magic. You and any allies in the area gain a +1 status bonus to AC. Each time you @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.3f5DMFu8fPiqHpRg]{Sustain the Spell}, the emanation's radius increases by 5 feet, to a maximum of 30 feet.

Increase the aura's counter to increase the radius by 5 feet.

Effect: Change Focus Point Maximum.name: Effect: Change Focus Point Maximum
Effect: Change Focus Point Maximum.description: Add this to any characters that should have a cap on Focus Points other than 3, then change the counter to the required value.

Effect: Condition for 1 hour (modifiable.name: Effect: Condition for 1 hour (modifiable)
Effect: Condition for 1 hour (modifiable.description:
It defaults to 1 round, expires on start of turn, edit the duration if neccessary.

It also defaults to setting the condition to 1 (for those where that matters), left-click the condition to increase this if it should be incrased. You cannot remove the condition until this effect is removed, at which time the condition goes away automatically.
